params.sender: Raw CCIP sender bytes from the message.

params.tokenCount: Number of token entries in the payload.

params.to: Destination recipient address on this chain.

ccipReceive((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes,.details: Note ensure you check the msg.sender is the OffRampRouter

returns._0: true if the interfaceId is supported

ccipPeers.return: peer Trusted remote adapter identifier bytes.

InvalidCcipPeer(uint64,bytes).notice: Thrown when an inbound message sender does not match configured peer.

InvalidCore(address).notice: Thrown when deploying with a zero core address.

InvalidNativeFee(uint256,uint256).notice: Thrown when supplied native fee is below required fee.

InvalidRecipient(address).notice: Thrown when destination recipient is invalid.

MissingCcipPeer(uint64).notice: Thrown when no trusted remote CCIP peer is configured for destination chain.

NativeRefundFailed(address,uint256).notice: Thrown when refunding excess native fee to caller fails.

OnlyCoreOwner(address,address).notice: Thrown when caller is not the current core owner.

UnsupportedCcipTokenPayload(uint256).notice: Thrown when inbound CCIP message unexpectedly carries token amounts.

CcipExtraArgsSet(uint64,bytes).notice: Emitted when CCIP extra arguments are configured for a chain selector.

CcipPeerSet(uint64,bytes).notice: Emitted when trusted CCIP peer is configured for a chain selector.

CcipReceive(uint64,bytes32,bytes32,addre.notice: Emitted when an inbound CCIP message is accepted and bridged in.

CcipSend(uint64,bytes32,bytes32,address,.notice: Emitted when an outbound CCIP bridge message is sent.

ccipExtraArgs(uint64).notice: Returns CCIP extra arguments configured for destination chain selector.

ccipPeers(uint64).notice: Returns the trusted remote adapter for a CCIP chain selector.

ccipReceive((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes,.notice: Called by the Router to deliver a message. If this reverts, any token transfers also revert. The message will move to a FAILED state and become available for manual execution.

core().notice: Returns the bridge core managed by this adapter.

quoteCcipSend(uint64,address,uint256,byt.notice: Quotes native fee required to send a bridge message through CCIP.

sendWithCcip(uint64,address,uint256,byte.notice: Bridges tokens through CCIP to the configured remote peer.

setCcipExtraArgs(uint64,bytes).notice: Sets CCIP extra arguments for a destination chain selector.

setCcipPeer(uint64,bytes).notice: Sets the trusted remote CCIP adapter for a chain selector.
